name: Multiplied Damage
description:
DMG dealt by your characters +1; DMG further increased by 1 for each stack of Multiplied Damage.
Multiplied Damage can stack up to 3 times.
descriptionraw: DMG dealt by your characters +1; DMG further increased by 1 for each stack of Multiplied Damage.\nMultiplied Damage can stack up to 3 times.
